t: ABOUT | jen-gordon-creative
s: Jen Gordon is a mixed media artist working in photography, printmaking and sculpture. She uses creativity as a catalyst for community dialogue to help curate cultural capital. She believes that art is a form of activism when in the public realm.

t: Jen Salke Departing Amazon MGM Studios as Head, Moving to Production Deal

t: Behind Amazon MGM’s Jen Salke Ouster and Its Fallout
s: March 28, 2025 - Yes, there were some big hits like 'Reacher.' But pricey underperformers like 'Lord of the Rings' and 'Citadel' along with little movement on the Bond franchise didn't help, even if, as chief Mike Hopkins is telling insiders, it was simply a matter of streamlining the org chart.

t: Amazon MGM Studios boss Jen Salke to step down. Read the internal memo

t: Jen Salke to step down from her role at Amazon MGM Studios - Los Angeles Times
s: March 28, 2025 - Jen Salke, head of Amazon MGM Studios, will step down from her role, according to an internal email from the company. She will start her own production entity.
